summary: FRONT BUMPER DESIGN IS DANGEROUS.  GM INDICATED TO ME THAT THE CLEARANCE OF THE TRUCK'S PLASTIC BUMPER IS EIGHT INCHES. BUMPER FELL OFF BACKING OUT OF 6-8" OF SNOW ON DRIVEWAY SURFACE.  DANGEROUS DRIVING ON WINTER ROADS WITH LOW FRONT BUMPER CLEARANCE.  OTHER: TRANSMISSION VIBRATION. EVIDENT WHEN VEHICLE PUCHASED ON 8/29/02.  AWD LIGHT APPEARED ON AND OFF BEGAN DEC. 25, 2002.  DEALER SAID AWD LIGHT PROBLEM WAS RESOLVED ON JANUARY 7, 2003.
